Model
Class HDRResult

java.lang.Object
  Model.HDRResult

public class HDRResult
extends java.lang.Object

This represents a (temp.) result of the calculation of an HDR Picture. It contains the radiance map E and the response curve g. It is used to exchange this information asynchronously between the calculator and the GUI.

Author:
sebastianzillessen
